tool_description: Calculates animal home ranges using various methods including minimum convex polygon, kernel density estimation, and fixed kernel methods.

method.description: Calculation method: mcp, kde, or fixed_kernel

error_messages: Array length mismatch: Latitude and longitude arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data points: Need at least 5 GPS fixes for home range calculation.
Invalid calculation method: Use mcp, kde, or fixed_kernel.
Invalid confidence level: Must be between 0.5 and 0.99.
Coordinate clustering error: All GPS points are too close together for meaningful home range calculation.
Invalid coordinates: Check latitude and longitude value ranges.
usage: Provide latitude and longitude arrays with at least 5 points. Optionally specify method and confidence_level. Returns home range area and boundary coordinates.

home_range_area_km2.description: Home range area in square kilometers

boundary_latitudes.description: Latitude coordinates of home range boundary

boundary_longitudes.description: Longitude coordinates of home range boundary

core_area_km2.description: Core area (50% utilization) in square kilometers
